info.name: FacebookMobile nuke feedcount
info.description: It's always 9+. Facebook, stop teasing me with your little red icon. That "9+" doesn't even represent any information. The only person that number would be meaningful to is someone who only had a handful of friends, because they might actually ever see ALL of their new posts. Ridiculous. This userstyle makes that go awaaaay! (Pairs nicely with Post interlude, which reminds you periodically to stop scrolling.) Note that Firefox is the only mobile browser I know of with userstyle support!

options.label: destroy it so I can't click it
